channel.title: [24/7][PVP] DeltaGamers Vampire Server!
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3Kh0z.png[/img]
DeltaGamers Vampires Server is a Humans vs Vampires all-out PVP server. Players square off against each other to prevent/infect the vampire infection and players form parties to hunt vampires/humans.
SERVER IS 24/7. We run on lag-free dedicated servers.
The server has many features including the ability to kill others for money, infect others, as well as werewolves, special human/vampire castles and MORE!
For more info check out our website http://www.deltagamers.com
